GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.155
GSD.description:
net: gso: fix panic on frag_list with mixed head alloc types

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.155 by commit 50868de7dc4e7f0fcadd6029f32bf4387c102ee6, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 3dcbdb134f329842a38f0e6797191b885ab00a00. For more details please see the references link.
